techmeme.title: Replit raised $250M led by Prysm, nearly tripling its valuation to $3B; its annualized revenue grew from $2.8M to $150M in the past year and it has 40M users (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
Larry Ellison becomes the world's richest person for the first time, at $393B, overtaking Elon Musk at $385B, as Oracle's stock jumps 40%+ after beating Q1 est. (Anders Melin/Bloomberg)
Amsterdam-based Nebius Group plans to raise $2B in convertible notes and $1B in equity to help it expand after signing an up to $17.4B+ deal with Microsoft (Bloomberg)
A US Treasury Department document says "digital content creators", including podcasters, social media influencers, and streamers, are eligible for tax-free tips (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
Amazon and Netflix partner to let advertisers buy Netflix ad inventory via Amazon's demand-side platform, after Amazon signed a similar deal with Disney in June (Brian Steinberg/Variety)
